text: (Tumhi) sanga ki tumhi apalya (tharavilelya) sahabhagi isvaranci avastha tara sanga, tyanna tumhi allahakherija pukarita asata, arthata mala he sanga ki tyanni dharatica konata (his'sa) banavila ahe kinva tyanca akasata kahi sahabhaga ahe athava amhi tyamnna ekhada grantha dila ahe ki he tyacya puravyavara atala asaveta? Navhe, kimbahuna he atyacari ekamekansi kevala phasavanukicya gostince vayade karita asatata
